text: Muttley is a fictional dog and sidekick of Dick Dastardly. He appeared in many animated series by Hanna-Barbera Productions from 1968 onward. ==Appearances== ===Television series=== ===Films=== * Scoob! (2020) -- (Main role) ==Portrayals== Muttley was first voiced by Don Messick before being replaced by Billy West. Category:Fictional characters introduced in the 1960s Category:Fictional dogs Category:Television characters Category:Hanna-Barbera characters Category:Anthromophic characters Category:Scooby-Doo characters Category:Animated movie villains
title: Muttley
